name: Skatrix
description: Skatrix is a skateboarding simulation that uses Augmented Reality to let you skate anywhere. First, find a skate spot by scanning your environment with your phone’s camera. Then, spawn your skater and some ramps. There are hundreds of trick combo possibilities at your fingertips. When you land a combo that you like, tap replay to enter cameraman mode and record the run from any angle. Or, complete Challenges to earn coins and unlock more ramps for your custom skate parks!
